ygData.subject: Re: New to group
ygData.msgSnippet: Good morning everyone, I was wondering if I could start a new character on the new server? I tried it last night and it asked me if I wanted to transfer the
ygData.messageBody:
Good morning everyone,
I was wondering if I could start a new character on the new server? I
tried it last night and it asked me if I wanted to transfer the
characters I already have to the new server :(

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Melanie Johnson <melanie_6602@y...>
wrote:
> Welcome to the group! No toons on the Rathe, and I
> recently started up on the new server, Stromm. Kinda
> weird, seeing all the newbie zones full (112 in
> Nektulos last night) and people actually making and
> buying tattered armor. :) It's really fun.
>
> --- Randy <morat68@y...> wrote:
> > I wanted to post real quick and say hello. I've been
> > playing EQ for
> > about 2 1/2 years now. I play on the Rathe server,
> > if anyone needs
> > anything feel free to ask. My toons are as follows:
> > Taladinos - 50 war (semi retired)
> > Fariel - 51 wiz
> > Morrog - 26 necro
> > Wahupta - 20 ranger
> > Glorfindol - 16 pally
> > Khaoslord - 12 mage
> > Lyzzarddo - 11 monk
> > Hughmun - 10 shammy
> > The guild I belong to is called "Cries on Havoc"
> > I'm also curious if anyone lives around St. Louis,
> > Mo.
> >
> >
> >
> >
>
>
> =====
> Never confuse your right to do something
> with the right thing to do.
>
>
